name: Dune I I
description:
Game made for Global GameJam 2022 by Abinash Acharya and Sagar Giri (the great [ he told me to say this] ) in 48 hours so there might me a few bugs. 

You control a vehicle that can transform into a car and a flying car. There's a big difference in the gameplay there. You can see the controls for the game in the main menu.

Your objective is to consume the purple orbs to get fuel and survive as long as possible.

[PS: This game's name is pronounced Dune aya aya not Dune 2. Please don't get confused.]
